definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
let's talk about the unpleasant things first/let's be frank
pinyin: chou3 hua4 shuo1 zai4 qian2 tou5

definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
around/from beginning to end/all around/front and rear
by contrast/but as for this.../viewed from another angle/subjectively/introspection
